title: PIXEL 4/4XL REBOOTING DUE KERNAL ERROR. WILL IT SEE SOMEBODY?
content:
After March update we have error while playing music through USB DAC in exclusive mode CRASHING PHONE TO REBOOT <<<< . Does anybody see this problem in Android team? 

I can't see no results already for a month A MONTH! And an April update doesn't fix the problem. 

How many system journals I should send to make it any damn sense????
